seasons.description: A group of kids investigates supernatural occurrences in their town.

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.plot: A young boy disappears in a small town, uncovering a series of supernatural mysteries.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.plot: As the town preps for Halloween, a high-scoring rival shakes things up at the arcade, and a skeptical Hopper inspects a field of rotting pumpkins.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: Holly, Jolly
episodes.plot: An increasingly concerned Nancy looks for Barb and finds out what Jonathan's been up to. Joyce is convinced Will is trying to talk to her.

seasons.description: The group faces new challenges and mysteries as they continue to navigate the supernatural realm.

episodes.title: Chapter One: MADMAX
episodes.plot: As the town preps for Halloween, a high-scoring rival shakes things up at the arcade, and a skeptical Hopper inspects a field of rotting pumpkins.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: Trick or Treat, Freak
episodes.plot: After Will sees something terrible on trick-or-treat night, Mike wonders whether Eleven's still out there. Nancy wrestles with the truth about Barb.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: The Pollywog
episodes.plot: Dustin adopts a strange new pet, and Eleven grows increasingly impatient. A well-meaning Bob urges Will to stand up to his fears.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: Will the Wise
episodes.plot: An ailing Will opens up to Joyce -- with disturbing results. While Hopper digs for the truth, Eleven unearths a surprising discovery.

seasons.description: The group faces new threats as they encounter sinister forces in Hawkins.

episodes.title: Chapter One: Suzie, Do You Copy?
episodes.plot: Summer brings new jobs and budding romance. But the mood shifts when Dustin's radio picks up a Russian broadcast, and Will senses something is wrong.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Mall Rats
episodes.plot: Nancy and Jonathan follow a lead, Steve and Robin sign on to a secret mission, and Max and Eleven go shopping. A rattled Billy has troubling visions.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: The Case of the Missing Lifeguard
episodes.plot: With El and Max looking for Billy, Will declares a day without girls. Steve and Dustin go on a stakeout, and Joyce and Hopper return to Hawkins Lab.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: The Sauna Test
episodes.plot: A code red brings the gang back together to face a frighteningly familiar evil. Karen urges Nancy to keep digging, and Robin finds a useful map.

seasons.description: The group faces new challenges and mysteries as they continue to uncover the secrets of the Upside Down.

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Hellfire Club
episodes.plot: As Hopper and Eleven adapt to their new surroundings, Joyce and the rest of the gang unravel a cryptic mystery involving a strange new entity.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: Vecna's Curse
episodes.plot: As strange occurrences plague Hawkins, the gang embarks on a perilous quest to uncover the truth behind the mysterious curse of Vecna.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: The Mind Flayer's Return
episodes.plot: With danger lurking around every corner, the group must confront their darkest fears as they face off against the return of the malevolent Mind Flayer.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: The Final Battle
episodes.plot: As the fate of Hawkins hangs in the balance, the group must band together for one last stand against the forces of darkness in a battle for survival.

seasons.description: The group faces new challenges as they encounter mysterious forces beyond their understanding.

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Awakening
episodes.plot: As strange occurrences plague Hawkins once again, the group must uncover the truth behind a series of bizarre events that hint at a larger conspiracy.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Shadow Realm
episodes.plot: As the group delves deeper into the mysteries of the Upside Down, they encounter a shadowy realm filled with unknown dangers and dark secrets.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: The Lost Ones
episodes.plot: With time running out, the group must race against the clock to rescue their friends and uncover the truth behind the sinister forces that threaten Hawkins.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: The Final Showdown
episodes.plot: In a thrilling conclusion, the group must face off against the ultimate evil in a final showdown that will determine the fate of Hawkins and the world.

seasons.description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

episodes.title: The End's Beginning
episodes.plot: The Witcher, Geralt of Rivia, encounters a mysterious woman named Renfri, and the kingdom of Cintra faces an imminent threat.

episodes.title: Four Marks
episodes.plot: Geralt takes on another Witcher's unfinished business in a kingdom stalked by a ferocious beast, and Yennefer contemplates her future.

episodes.title: Betrayer Moon
episodes.plot: Against his better judgment, Geralt accompanies Jaskier to a royal ball. Ciri wanders into an enchanted forest. Yennefer tries to protect her charges.

seasons.description: Geralt continues his journey, encountering new allies and adversaries as he battles to protect the people he cares about.

episodes.title: A Grain of Truth
episodes.plot: Geralt of Rivia encounters a cursed nobleman's beastly nature, and Yennefer hones her craft as a mage in training.

episodes.title: The Bounds of Reason
episodes.plot: Geralt takes on another Witcher's unfinished business in a kingdom stalked by a ferocious beast, and Yennefer contemplates her future.

episodes.title: Rare Species
episodes.plot: Against his better judgment, Geralt accompanies Jaskier to a royal ball. Ciri wanders into an enchanted forest. Yennefer tries to protect her charges.

seasons.description: Geralt faces new challenges as he navigates the turbulent political landscape of the Continent.

episodes.title: The Edge of the World
episodes.plot: Geralt takes on a contract to hunt a mysterious creature, and Ciri faces a dangerous encounter in the forest.

episodes.title: Of Banquets, Bastards and Burials
episodes.plot: Geralt is hired to investigate a murder at a royal feast, and Yennefer confronts the consequences of her past actions.

episodes.title: A Shard of Ice
episodes.plot: Geralt reunites with an old flame, and Ciri discovers her own powers as she trains with the druids.

seasons.description: Geralt's journey takes him to new lands as he faces off against powerful adversaries and uncovers ancient secrets.

episodes.title: The Tower of the Swallow
episodes.plot: Geralt investigates a series of strange occurrences at a remote tower, and Ciri struggles to control her growing powers.

episodes.title: The Lady of the Lake
episodes.plot: Geralt encounters a mysterious woman in the lake, and Yennefer faces a powerful sorcerer who threatens her life.

episodes.title: Season of Storms
episodes.plot: Geralt must navigate a deadly storm as he races to uncover the truth behind a series of gruesome murders.

seasons.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer partners with a former student to secure his family's future.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.plot: After being diagnosed with terminal cancer, Walter White teams up with a former student to manufacture and sell methamphetamine.

episodes.title: Cat's in the Bag...
episodes.plot: Walter and Jesse try to dispose of Emilio's body, and Skyler grows suspicious of Walter's behavior.

episodes.title: ...And the Bag's in the River
episodes.plot: Walter must make a difficult decision when Krazy-8 regains consciousness, and Jesse tries to sell the meth they cooked.

episodes.title: Cancer Man
episodes.plot: Walter takes drastic measures to protect his secret, and Skyler confronts Walter about his lies.

seasons.description: Walter's double life becomes increasingly complicated as he struggles to maintain control of his illegal operation.

episodes.title: Seven Thirty-Seven
episodes.plot: Walter and Jesse face consequences for their actions, and Hank's investigation leads him to a shocking discovery.

episodes.title: Grilled
episodes.plot: Walter and Jesse are taken hostage by a crazed Tuco, and Hank closes in on Jesse's location.

episodes.title: Bit by a Dead Bee
episodes.plot: Walter tries to cover his tracks, and Skyler confronts Jesse about his role in Walter's disappearance.

seasons.description: Walter's empire expands as he faces new threats and challenges in the world of methamphetamine production.

episodes.title: No Más
episodes.plot: Walter and Jesse are forced to deal with the aftermath of their actions, and Hank faces consequences for his investigation.

episodes.title: Caballo Sin Nombre
episodes.plot: Walter tries to repair his fractured relationship with Skyler, and Jesse navigates the dangers of the drug trade.

episodes.title: I.F.T.
episodes.plot: Walter takes drastic measures to protect his secret, and Skyler confronts Walter about his lies.

episodes.title: Green Light
episodes.plot: Walter's operation faces a new threat, and Hank uncovers evidence that leads him closer to the truth.

seasons.description: Walter's grip on his empire weakens as his enemies close in, leading to a dramatic showdown.

episodes.title: Box Cutter
episodes.plot: Walter and Jesse face the consequences of their actions, and Gus takes drastic measures to maintain control.

episodes.title: Thirty-Eight Snub
episodes.plot: Walter struggles to adapt to life without Gus, and Jesse faces a difficult decision about his future.

episodes.title: Open House
episodes.plot: Walter's relationship with Skyler deteriorates, and Jesse makes a shocking discovery about his past.

seasons.description: The noble families of Westeros vie for control of the Iron Throne as dark forces gather beyond the Wall.

episodes.title: Winter Is Coming
episodes.plot: The Stark family receives an unexpected visitor, and the Night's Watch uncovers a mysterious threat in the North.

episodes.title: The Kingsroad
episodes.plot: Jon Snow faces the realities of life at the Wall, and Daenerys begins her journey to reclaim the Iron Throne.

episodes.title: Lord Snow
episodes.plot: Ned Stark navigates the treacherous politics of King's Landing, and Tyrion Lannister arrives at the Wall.

episodes.title: Cripples, Bastards, and Broken Things
episodes.plot: Catelyn Stark takes matters into her own hands, and Daenerys faces challenges as she adjusts to life as a Khaleesi.

seasons.description: War rages across Westeros as alliances are forged and broken in the battle for the Iron Throne.

episodes.title: The North Remembers
episodes.plot: Tyrion arrives in King's Landing to serve as Hand of the King, and Stannis Baratheon makes a claim to the Iron Throne.

episodes.title: The Night Lands
episodes.plot: Arya Stark faces danger on her journey north, and Daenerys seeks allies to help her reclaim the Iron Throne.

episodes.title: What Is Dead May Never Die
episodes.plot: Theon Greyjoy returns to Pyke, and Jon Snow faces a crisis at the Fist of the First Men.

seasons.description: The power struggles in Westeros intensify as new alliances are formed and old enemies resurface.

episodes.title: Valar Dohaeris
episodes.plot: Jon Snow encounters the wildlings beyond the Wall, and Daenerys plans her conquest of the Slaver's Bay.

episodes.title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
episodes.plot: Bran Stark has a series of prophetic dreams, and Jaime Lannister faces judgment for his crimes.

episodes.title: Walk of Punishment
episodes.plot: Robb Stark faces challenges as King in the North, and Tyrion Lannister schemes to maintain his power in King's Landing.

seasons.description: The fate of Westeros hangs in the balance as the War of the Five Kings reaches its climax.

episodes.title: Two Swords
episodes.plot: Tywin Lannister reforges Ice into two new swords, and Daenerys begins her conquest of Meereen.

episodes.title: The Lion and the Rose
episodes.plot: Joffrey Baratheon's wedding day ends in tragedy, and Arya Stark continues her journey with the Hound.

episodes.title: Breaker of Chains
episodes.plot: Tyrion Lannister faces trial for Joffrey's murder, and Jon Snow plans an attack on Craster's Keep.

episodes.title: Oathkeeper
episodes.plot: Daenerys makes a difficult decision in Meereen, and Jaime Lannister tries to rescue Tyrion from his cell.

seasons.description: A lone bounty hunter navigates the outer reaches of the galaxy, taking on dangerous missions and facing unexpected challenges.

episodes.title: Chapter 1: The Mandalorian
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian accepts a risky job offer that leads him on a perilous journey across the desert planet of Tatooine.

episodes.title: Chapter 2: The Child
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian encounters a mysterious creature known as the Child, and he must decide whether to fulfill his mission or protect the innocent.

episodes.title: Chapter 3: The Sin
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian returns to collect his reward, but he faces a moral dilemma when he learns the fate of the Child.

episodes.title: Chapter 4: Sanctuary
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian seeks refuge on a remote planet, but he is drawn into a conflict between the locals and a band of mercenaries.

seasons.description: The Mandalorian continues his quest across the galaxy, encountering new allies and enemies as he searches for answers about the Child.

episodes.title: Chapter 9: The Marshal
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian teams up with an unlikely ally to take down a dangerous foe, and he uncovers clues about the Child's origins.

episodes.title: Chapter 10: The Passenger
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian helps a passenger transport her eggs across the galaxy, but they encounter trouble along the way.

episodes.title: Chapter 11: The Heiress
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian teams up with a group of fellow Mandalorians to take down an Imperial stronghold and rescue the Child.

seasons.description: The Mandalorian continues his quest across the galaxy, facing new challenges and forging unlikely alliances.

episodes.title: Chapter 12: The Siege
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian helps an old ally take down an Imperial facility, but they uncover a sinister plot in the process.

episodes.title: Chapter 13: The Jedi
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian seeks out a powerful Jedi to train the Child, but they must confront a deadly foe together.

episodes.title: Chapter 14: The Tragedy
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian races to rescue the Child from the clutches of a dangerous enemy, but he faces unexpected obstacles along the way.

seasons.description: The Mandalorian's journey takes him to new worlds and new dangers as he searches for answers about the Child's origins.

episodes.title: Chapter 15: The Believer
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian teams up with an unlikely ally to infiltrate an Imperial base and retrieve vital information.

episodes.title: Chapter 16: The Rescue
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian assembles a team of allies to launch a daring rescue mission and confront the forces of darkness.

episodes.title: Chapter 17: The Return
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian faces a deadly showdown with an old adversary, and he discovers shocking truths about the Child's past.

episodes.title: Chapter 18: The Reckoning
episodes.plot: The Mandalorian confronts his past and makes difficult choices as he prepares for the final battle against his enemies.

seasons.description: A small German town is rocked by the disappearance of two young children, revealing a web of secrets and time travel.

episodes.title: Secrets
episodes.plot: The disappearance of a young boy exposes the dark secrets of Winden, including hidden relationships and mysterious time travel.

episodes.title: Lies
episodes.plot: As the search for the missing boy continues, the secrets of Winden's past are revealed, and the true nature of time travel becomes clear.

episodes.title: Past and Present
episodes.plot: The connections between the past, present, and future become more apparent as the residents of Winden grapple with the consequences of their actions.

episodes.title: Double Lives
episodes.plot: The truth about the time travel experiments is revealed, and the residents of Winden must confront their own double lives.

seasons.description: The mystery deepens as the residents of Winden uncover more secrets about their past and future.

episodes.title: Beginnings and Endings
episodes.plot: The apocalypse looms closer as Jonas travels to the future, and the residents of Winden struggle to prevent the end of the world.

episodes.title: Dark Matter
episodes.plot: The secrets of Winden's past are uncovered, revealing the true origins of the time travel experiments and the mysterious stranger.

episodes.title: Ghosts
episodes.plot: As the apocalypse draws near, Jonas and his friends race against time to uncover the truth about their families and prevent a tragedy.

seasons.description: The final chapter of the time-bending saga unfolds as the truth about Winden and its inhabitants is finally revealed.

episodes.title: Deja-vu
episodes.plot: As the apocalypse looms, Jonas and Martha travel to the origin world and confront the true source of the time loops.

episodes.title: The Survivors
episodes.plot: Jonas and Martha race against time to stop the apocalypse and save their loved ones, but they must make a sacrifice to break the cycle.

episodes.title: Adam and Eva
episodes.plot: The true mastermind behind the time loops is revealed, and Jonas and Martha must confront their destinies to save the world.

seasons.description: A new cycle begins as the residents of Winden face a new set of challenges and mysteries.

episodes.title: The Beginning
episodes.plot: A mysterious stranger arrives in Winden, setting off a chain of events that will change the town forever.

episodes.title: Time Loop
episodes.plot: The residents of Winden discover that they are trapped in a time loop, and they must find a way to break free before it's too late.

episodes.title: Parallel Worlds
episodes.plot: Jonas and Martha travel to parallel worlds in search of answers, but they uncover dark secrets that threaten to tear them apart.

episodes.title: Endless Cycle
episodes.plot: The truth about the time loops is finally revealed, and the residents of Winden must confront their past and future to break the cycle once and for all.

seasons.description: A socially awkward teenager teams up with a high school classmate to start a sex therapy clinic for their fellow students.

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.plot: Otis, a socially awkward teenager, teams up with Maeve, a rebellious classmate, to start a sex therapy clinic at their high school.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.plot: Otis struggles to balance his new role as a sex therapist with his own personal issues, while Maeve deals with family troubles.

episodes.title: Episode 3
episodes.plot: Otis and Maeve navigate the complexities of teenage sexuality as they try to help their classmates with their problems.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.plot: Otis faces a moral dilemma when he discovers a dark secret about one of his classmates, while Maeve struggles with her feelings for him.

episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.title: Episode 11
episodes.plot: Otis and his friends come together to support each other through difficult times, while they also face external pressures and conflicts.

seasons.description: As the students of Moordale Secondary School enter their final year, they must confront their past, present, and future.

episodes.plot: Otis and Maeve struggle to define their relationship as they prepare for life after high school, while Eric and Adam face challenges in their own lives.

episodes.plot: Otis and his friends come together to plan a prom night to remember, but they must confront their fears and insecurities along the way.

episodes.title: Episode 14
episodes.plot: As graduation day approaches, Otis and his friends reflect on their time at Moordale and prepare for the next chapter of their lives.

seasons.description: A young woman returns home after being missing for seven years, but her story of captivity and near-death experiences is met with skepticism.

episodes.plot: Prairie Johnson returns to her family in a miraculous reunion, but she refuses to reveal where she's been or what happened to her.

episodes.plot: Prairie recruits a group of misfits to help her uncover the truth about her captivity, and they embark on a dangerous journey together.

episodes.title: Champion
episodes.plot: The group faces unexpected challenges as they search for answers, and Prairie's past comes back to haunt her.

episodes.title: Away
episodes.plot: Prairie's story takes a dark turn as she confronts the truth about her captors and the nature of her own existence.

seasons.description: Prairie's quest continues as she delves deeper into the mysteries of the multiverse and uncovers shocking truths about her own identity.

episodes.plot: Prairie discovers new dimensions and alternate realities, but she struggles to maintain her grip on reality.

episodes.plot: The group embarks on a perilous journey to find the mysterious treasure, but they encounter unexpected dangers along the way.

episodes.plot: Prairie confronts her own demons as she battles to save her friends and uncover the truth about the multiverse.

episodes.plot: Prairie faces off against a dangerous foe who seeks to harness the power of the multiverse for his own nefarious purposes.

episodes.plot: Prairie delves deeper into the mysteries of the multiverse and uncovers shocking truths about her own destiny.
